015package com.google.common.eventbus;
016
017import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
018import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
019import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
020import java.lang.annotation.Target;
021
022/**
023 * Marks an event subscriber method as being thread-safe. This annotation indicates that EventBus
024 * may invoke the event subscriber simultaneously from multiple threads.
025 *
026 * <p>This does not mark the method, and so should be used in combination with {@link Subscribe}.
027 *
028 * @author Cliff Biffle
029 * @since 10.0
030 */
031@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
032@Target(ElementType.METHOD)
033public @interface AllowConcurrentEvents {}
